name: MazeInvaders
description:
MazeInvaders was created during Ludum Dare 41, within 72 hours.
The given topic was: Combine 2 Incompatible Genres

My Idea was an FPS - Tower Defense - Game and MazeInvaders is the result.
I know, it is nothing special, but for my first GameJam (and my first "real" Game), I'm personally a little bit proud anyway.
I hope you can have some fun ^^

—How to Play:—

Move: WASD
Shoot: Left Mouse
Reload: R
Build: E

Goal of the Game is to reach the access on the other side of the maze.However, this opens only after the 10. wave of enemies.But even then it is still dangerous in the labyrinth, so be careful.

You lose when you have no life left or your camp is destroyed.The monsters inflict damage when touched, so do not let them get too close.

You can shoot with the left mouse button, or buy a tower for 10 gold, by pressing 'E' on a tower base.If you have no more ammo you can reload with 'R', however, this takes a moment.

Good luck
